blogPost.excerpt: Design is a continually changing environment. What’s cool one day, is old the next. So designers always have to be on their toes - it’s a pretty hectic gig. And this is where Yizy comes into play!
blogPost.body: Design is a continually changing environment. What’s cool one day, is old the next. So designers always have to be on their toes - it’s a pretty hectic gig. And this is where Yizy comes into play!
blogPost.title: Yizy - Give Meaning to your Screenshots and Bookmarks!
blogPost.author: Eyobiel Andebrhan

localize.description: 设计是一个不断变化的环境。今天很酷的东西，明天就会过时。所以设计师必须时刻保持警惕，这是一个相当忙碌的工作。而这正是Yizy发挥作用的地方。
localize.tagline: 给你的截屏和书签赋予意义!

localize.description: 設計是一個不斷變化的環境。今天很酷的東西，明天就會過時。所以設計師必須時刻保持警惕，這是一個相當忙碌的工作。而這正是Yizy發揮作用的地方。
localize.tagline: 給你的截屏和書籤賦予意義!

previous.excerpt: After more than 150,000 happy customers on the Mac App Store, MeetInOne - the all-in-one Google Meet desktop app - is finally coming to the Windows Store. Get the app now & enjoy a 50% discount on our one-time pricing. The discount is valid until next Sunday.
previous.title: MeetInOne - The all-in-one Google Meet desktop app for Windows

localize.description: 在Mac App Store上拥有超过15万名满意的用户之后，MeetInOne--这个集所有功能于一身的Google Meet桌面应用--终于来到了Windows Store。现在就获取该应用，并享受一次性价格的50%折扣。折扣有效期至下周日。
localize.tagline: 适用于Windows的全能型Google Meet桌面应用。

localize.description: 在Mac App Store上擁有超過15萬名滿意的用戶之後，MeetInOne--這個集所有功能於一身的Google Meet桌面應用--終於來到了Windows Store。現在就獲取該應用，並享受一次性價格的50%折扣。折扣有效期至下週日。
localize.tagline: 適用於Windows的全能型Google Meet桌面應用。

next.excerpt: Verbz is a voice productivity app for teams. Create notes, assign tasks, make announcements, run stand-ups, or just chat. Talk or type, listen or read.
next.title: Verbz - Create tasks, notes, and chat, all with voice

localize.description: Verbz是一款针对团队的语音生产力应用。创建笔记，分配任务，发布公告，运行站立，或只是聊天。谈话或打字，听或读。
localize.tagline: 创建任务、笔记和聊天，都可以用语音来完成

localize.description: Verbz是一款針對團隊的語音生產力應用。創建筆記，分配任務，發佈公告，運行站立，或只是聊天。談話或打字，聽或讀。
localize.tagline: 創建任務、筆記和聊天，都可以用語音來完成
